mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list (order_no, user_no, order_use_point, order_use_coupon, order_dlv_fee, order_total_price, order_set_point, order_delivery_info, order_status, order_date, order_update_date) VALUES (order_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{order_use_point}, #{order_use_coupon}, #{order_dlv_fee}, #{order_total_product_price}, #{order_set_point}, #{order_delivery_info}, '결제 완료', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
